testcase.classname: As an administrator, I want to access detailed information about the course category with the specified ID via an API connection.
testcase.name: When a GET request is sent to the /api/category/{id} endpoint with valid authorization and correct data (id),
testcase.system-out: * The api user constructs the base url with the "admin" token...............passed * The api user sets "api/category/636" path parameters......................passed * The api user sends a "GET" request and saves the returned response........passed * The api user verifies that the status code is 200.........................passed * The api user confirms that the remark information in the response body is "success"..passed * The api user verifies that the data in the response body includes 636, "Online-Education-2", "/store/1/default_images/categories_icons/code.png", 11, 79, 636, "en" and "Online Education"..passed
